name: Block World 3D: Craft & Build
description:
Block World 3D is an online open world sandbox game about building and survival, where you can explore, craft, survive, build and more with other players.

EXPLORATION
Explore an endless world, various locations from hot desert to cold tundra, new animals from camels to polar bears, new plants from palm to spruce.

CRAFTING
Collect resources and create various items and blocks from them. Use special crafting recipes to create, improve, repair, enchant unique items.

BUILDING
Create and share your own unique buildings with real players. From a small house to a huge castle. You are only limited by your own imagination.

SURVIVAL
Try to survive in a dangerous world, build shelters and traps, hide in caves and dungeons at night. Fight mobs to protect yourself and don't forget to satisfy your hunger.

CREATIVE
Unlimited creativity, create any world, you have unlimited resources, craft any items and blocks, build anything you want. You can fly and be invulnerable.

ADVENTURE
In adventure mode, it is impossible to destroy and place blocks, however, players can interact with mobs and objects, craft items.

MULTIPLAYER
The game is available network game for all players, play online with your friends on the same server.

GAME MODES
Survival, building, adventure, battle... Each mode has its own characteristics and unique capabilities.

GAME WORLD
In each world you will find a variety of flora and fauna, blocks, caves, biomes, buildings, creatures, events.

CUSTOMIZATION
Choose the color of the skin and eyes, hairstyle, boots, pants, shirt, gloves, cloak for your character.

ITEMS AND BLOCKS
Many items - weapons, armor, clothing, tools, resources, ingots, stones, food, potions, dyes, plants and more.
Many blocks - natural, building, decorative, interactive.

FREEDOM
The game is a block sandbox, there is no main goal, players are not limited by anything and set their own goals. You can do whatever you want.

Join and play together with millions of players from all over the world!
